title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1045.14 - Enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1045.14 - Enforcement

State Regulations
(a) Any person
violating any of these rules may receive an appearance ticket and/or is subject
to ejectment from the transit center or bus. (b) Any police officer shall be empowered to
issue an appearance ticket or order ejectment from the transit center or bus
for violation of any of these rules. (c) Violation of these rules shall constitute
an offense and shall be punishable by a fine not exceeding $50 or imprisonment
for not more than 30 days or both. Public Authorities Law, section
1266(4). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1045.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
